# Article Idea Generator

> Free AI-powered article title generator that creates SEO-optimized, engaging titles instantly. Beat writer's block and generate creative article ideas in seconds.

## About

Article Idea Generator is a free web tool that uses GPT-4o-mini to generate creative, SEO-friendly article titles and abstracts. Writers, bloggers, content marketers, and journalists use it to overcome writer's block and find inspiration for their next piece.

## Features

- **AI-Powered Generation**: Uses OpenAI's GPT-4o-mini model
- **SEO-Optimized Titles**: Generates titles designed for search engine visibility
- **Article Abstracts**: Creates compelling summaries for your topics
- **Voice Input**: Speak your topic instead of typing
- **Dark Mode**: Comfortable viewing in any lighting
- **Recent Searches**: Quick access to your previous topics
- **Share Functionality**: Share results on Twitter and LinkedIn

## How It Works

1. Enter a topic or keyword (e.g., "machine learning", "sustainable living")
2. Click "Generate Ideas" or use voice input
3. Receive 5 unique, SEO-optimized article title suggestions
4. Optionally generate an abstract for any title
5. Copy or share your favorite ideas

## Use Cases

- Blog post ideas
- Newsletter topics
- YouTube video titles
- Podcast episode names
- Social media content
- Academic paper titles
- Marketing campaign headlines

## Free Writing Tools

In addition to the AI generator, we offer free writing tools:

### Word Counter
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/word-counter

Free online word counter that provides:
- Real-time word, character, sentence, and paragraph counts
- Reading time and speaking time estimates
- Top keyword frequency analysis
- Character count with and without spaces

Perfect for writers checking article length, students meeting word count requirements, and SEO professionals analyzing content.

### QR Code Generator
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/qr-code-generator

Free online QR code generator that creates:
- 17+ QR code types:
  - Basic: URL, text, WiFi, vCard, email, phone, SMS, location, calendar events
  - Social: Twitter/X, YouTube, Facebook, App Store
  - Payments: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano, Solana
- Custom colors with 8 presets or custom picker
- Logo support (upload your own logo)
- 5 frame styles (none, simple, rounded, badge, banner) with custom text
- 6 style presets (Clean, Scan Me, Business, Restaurant, Modern, Dark Mode)
- Multiple sizes (128px to 512px)
- 4 error correction levels
- Downloads in PNG, SVG, or JPG formats (high resolution)
- Copy to clipboard functionality
- Local history storage
- **Batch mode**: Generate multiple QR codes at once, download as ZIP

Perfect for business cards, restaurant WiFi sharing, product packaging, event marketing, and bulk QR code generation.

### Title Case Converter
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/title-case

Free online text case converter that supports:
- 16 case styles across 3 categories:
  - Writing styles: Title Case (AP/Chicago/APA), Sentence case, Start Case, UPPERCASE, lowercase
  - Programming formats: camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, CONSTANT_CASE, dot.case, path/case
  - Special styles: aLtErNaTiNg CaSe, iNVERSE cASE
- Real-time conversion as you type
- One-click copy for any style
- Copy all styles at once
- Auto-detects current case style
- Sample text quick-select buttons
- Character and word count display

Perfect for writers, developers, journalists, and content creators.

### JSON Formatter
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/json-formatter

Free online JSON formatter and validator that provides:
- JSON beautification with customizable indentation (2, 4, 8 spaces or tabs)
- JSON minification for production use
- Real-time syntax validation with line/column error positions
- JSON structure analysis (keys, objects, arrays, depth, data types)
- File upload and download support
- Copy to clipboard functionality
- Sample JSON templates

Perfect for developers, API testers, and anyone working with JSON data.

### URL Shortener
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/url-shortener

Free online URL shortener that provides:
- Instant URL shortening with no signup required
- QR code generation for shortened links
- Link history saved locally
- One-click copy to clipboard
- Clean, shareable short links
- Works with any valid URL

Perfect for social media, marketing campaigns, print materials, and messaging.

### PDF Signer
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/pdf-signer

Free online PDF signer and form filler that provides:

**Signature Options**:
- Draw signature with mouse, trackpad, or touch
- Type signature with 5 handwriting font styles (Dancing Script, Great Vibes, Pacifico, Caveat, Satisfy)
- Upload existing signature image

**Form Filling Tools**:
- Full name field (auto-populates from your input)
- Initials (auto-derived from full name, e.g., "John Doe" → "JD")
- Text fields (editable after placement)
- Date stamps (auto-fills current date)
- Checkboxes

**Annotation Tools**:
- Highlight with 5 colors (yellow, green, red, blue, orange)
- Circle, rectangle, line, and arrow shapes
- Strikethrough text
- Image stamps for logos or custom graphics

**Key Features**:
- 100% private: All processing happens in browser, files never uploaded to servers
- Drag and resize any element
- Multi-page PDF support with navigation
- Zoom controls (50% to 300%)
- Customizable colors and stroke widths
- Instant PDF download with all annotations embedded

Perfect for signing contracts, filling forms, annotating documents, and adding approval stamps without installing software.

### Cover Image Generator
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/cover-image-generator

The most feature-rich free cover image generator for blog posts and social media:

**24+ Gradient Presets** organized by mood:
- Vibrant: Purple Dream, Sunset Glow, Ocean Wave, Flamingo, Aurora, Citrus Punch, Neon Lights, Cotton Candy
- Dark & Professional: Midnight, Deep Sea, Noir, Charcoal, Space, Dark Violet
- Nature: Forest, Clear Sky, Sunrise, Meadow, Autumn Leaves, Ocean Deep
- Minimal: Clean White, Soft Gray, Cream, Misty Rose
- Custom color picker for your own gradients

**16 Platform Size Presets**:
- Social Media: Twitter/X (1200×675), LinkedIn (1200×627), Facebook (1200×630), Instagram Landscape/Square/Story, Pinterest (1000×1500), YouTube Thumbnail (1280×720)
- Blogging: Dev.to (1000×420), Medium (1400×787), Hashnode (1600×840), Substack (1456×816), Ghost (2000×1200), WordPress (1200×628)
- General: Open Graph (1200×630), Custom dimensions

**12 Pattern Overlays**: Dots, Grid, Diagonal Lines, Waves, Circuit Board, Topography, Hexagons, Triangles, Crosses, Noise/Grain, Confetti

**8 Theme Layouts**: Centered, Modern Split, Minimal, Bold, Card, Corner Badge, Gradient Text, Outlined

**30+ Dev Icons** via devicon CDN: React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Python, Rust, Go, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Firebase, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS, Vue, Angular, Svelte, and more

**8 Quick-Start Templates**: Tech Blog, Tutorial, Announcement, Dark Minimal, Professional, Vibrant, Code Focused, Clean Light

**Key Features**:
- Download all 15 sizes at once with one click
- Custom logo upload (up to 5MB)
- Gradient angle control (0-360°)
- Pattern opacity slider
- Settings saved to localStorage
- Copy settings as JSON
- Real-time preview
- High-quality PNG export

Perfect for bloggers, developers, content creators, and marketers who need professional cover images without design skills.

### Background Remover
URL: https://articleideagenerator.com/tools/background-remover

Free AI-powered background remover that works entirely in your browser:

**AI Background Removal**:
- One-click automatic background removal
- RMBG-1.4 model for high-quality edge detection
- Handles complex edges (hair, fur, transparent objects)
- Works with people, products, objects, and more

**Background Options**:
- Transparent PNG export
- Solid color backgrounds (preset colors + custom picker)
- Custom background image upload
- Blur original background with adjustable intensity

**Key Features**:
- 100% private: All processing happens in browser using AI
- No file uploads to servers ever
- Supports PNG, JPG, WebP up to 20MB
- Before/after comparison slider
- Recent colors saved locally
- Download as PNG or JPG
- No watermarks or signup required

Perfect for e-commerce product photos, profile pictures, marketing materials, and creative projects requiring transparent backgrounds.

### Coming Soon
- Character Counter - Track limits for Twitter, LinkedIn, meta descriptions
- Reading Time Calculator - Generate "X min read" badges
- Headline Analyzer - Score headlines for SEO and engagement

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js 13 and React 18
- Styled with Tailwind CSS
- PWA-enabled for offline access
- Mobile-responsive design
- Rate limited to 10 requests per minute

## API

The site does not offer a public API. All generation is done through the web interface.

## Links

- Website: https://articleideagenerator.com
- FAQ: https://articleideagenerator.com/faq
- GitHub: https://github.com/Olanetsoft/article-idea-generator

For issues or feature requests, please open a GitHub issue.
